com.paypal.merchant.sdk.domain.shopping
Interface Shipping

public interface Shipping

Contains information about the shipping cost and tax rate.
To create a shipping cost use DomainFactory.newShipping(cost, taxrate)
TaxRates used for shipping must have a name ("Shipping Tax", etc).

          method to get the shipping address.

          A utility API to set all costs associated with Shipping in one place.
 void setTaxRate(TaxRate taxRate)
          Sets the tax rate to use for shipping.
TaxRate objects used for shipping must have a name or they will be
considered invalid.
 void setTaxValue(BigDecimal taxValue)
          setShippingTax as a value rather than as a percentage.
 

Method Detail

getCost

BigDecimal getCost()
Fetches the shipping cost.

Returns:
A BigDecimal containing the shipping cost

setCost

void setCost(BigDecimal shippingCost)
Sets the shipping cost for this Shipping object.

Parameters:
shippingCost - A BigDecimal containing the cost.

getTaxRate

TaxRate getTaxRate()
Fetches the tax rate used for shipping.

Returns:
A TaxRate object representing the tax rate.

setTaxRate

void setTaxRate(TaxRate taxRate)
Sets the tax rate to use for shipping.
TaxRate objects used for shipping must have a name or they will be
considered invalid.

Parameters:
taxRate - A TaxRate object defining the tax rate's rate and name.

setTaxValue

void setTaxValue(BigDecimal taxValue)
setShippingTax as a value rather than as a percentage. This is a utility for the app to set Tax as a value rather than as a rate. If both are set then the call that happens last will override the other value.

getAddress

Address getAddress()
method to get the shipping address.

Returns:
: Address object that contains the shipping address information.

method to set the shipping address.
